text: Konstantinos Kariotis (born 1 October 1971) is a Greek rower. He competed in the men's single sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Greece Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stuttgart
title: Konstantinos Kariotis
